events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your online store, but I want to return it and get a refund because it doesn't fit me well.
The customer's request has been identified as related to refund and return issues.
Assigning this refund request to the returns specialist team for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to return your jacket and receive a refund. Let me help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can process your refund smoothly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I want to return the jacket because it's too small and doesn’t fit comfortably.
Thank you for the details. I’ve initiated your return request and you will receive a prepaid shipping label via email shortly to send the jacket back for a full refund.
Thanks for the quick help! I appreciate how easy you made the return process, and I look forward to getting my refund.
We have confirmed receipt of your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and to see if you need any further assistance from us.
Since your refund has been processed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for reaching out!
